TopicTitle: Counting down the days until KSP 1.0: Day 3

Articles.Content: New parts & luxurious interiors!

Woot!

Edit: I'm glad they have air brakes now, Sometimes when I try to land I end up speeding to much, and brakes aren't that effective sometimes.

FIRST!!!!

Ohhh air-breaks?

Edit: Ninja'd
Wow. Just wow.
Woooohhhoooooooo and oh my god that tail is smexy....

Ninja'd.

Also, neat trailer.
I was like: meh, nothing I haven't seem already. Then I saw the air brakes, and crapped myself in excitement
was the long overdue feature air brakes?! did i call it?! i think i did!
Airbrakes! Yay! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Has anyone else noticed that the forum titles are getting longer? Check the last two posts, there's definitely progression...

ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED
Whoooooo!

Are those airbrakes?

I think they're backwards though \*has no idea what direction they're supposed to face\*

Notice those landing gear eh? Very nice squad.

Also @smjjames, those air brakes are correct.
Air braaaaaaaaaakes! Nice, I wasn't expecting that!

Anyone else see a kOS on the cockpit console?

Do we haz scriptable autopilot?
There will not be any more of these videos. The duty will be taken over by the streamers, Youtubers, etc.

Just realized...I think we are missing a whole new addition in all these videos..

New music?
Are those OMS engines new too?

> 
> Are those OMS engines new too?

No, they are relatively old radial engines. Nobody ever uses them because they are to inefficient.

> 
> Just realized...I think we are missing a whole new addition in all these videos..
> New music?

It's probably just music they put in over the video. I wouldn't expect anything in that department

THANK YOU SO MUCH!

I was actually getting to the point where i was willing to use part mods to get airbrakes (during teh short time i messed around with FAR/NEAR, i noticed how annoying slowing down was). This solves all these issues (and the air brakes actually look nice too).

I wonder if theyll double up as stabilizers when a craft starts to flip out, deploy them in the rear and hopefully youll stabilize.

> 
> It's probably just music they put in over the video. I wouldn't expect anything in that department

Actually that's the astronaut complex music...

Nice IVAs, I especially like those MFDs. Hopefully we won't have to wait long for RPM support.

The airbrakes are a nice addition as well, but with FAR I often end up having to use engines with thrust reversers as well.
Airbrake hype!
air-breaks! Want it!
